description:
![Screenshot of Blocktality](http://blocktality.sourceforge.net/images/screenshot.jpg)

###What is Blocktality?

Blocktality is a top-down shooter in which the main character 'Sphero' is fighting against the cuboids for the freedom of his people.  The game play involves fast-paced combat interspersed with interesting physics puzzles.
author: Mike Cook,  Joe Flint,  and Max Lazaroff
